quote: I make $162 per hour with sellers, $360 with referrals, and $453 with buyers.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the conventional wisdom that sellers are more profitable than buyers.
suggested_hook: Think sellers are always more profitable? Think again!

quote: Send a video text to the listing agent to stand out.
why_clipworthy: Provides a unique and actionable tactic for getting offers noticed.
suggested_hook: Want your offer to stand out? Try this simple trick!
